extended_title.label: Extended name
extended_title.help: The extended name is used in the header of the application form

apply_title.label: Application title
apply_title.help: The title of the application form

email.label: Email
email.help: Filled out application forms will be sent to this address

primary_color.label: Primary color
primary_color.help: The primary color of the club's application form

logo.label: Logo
logo.help: The logo is displayed in the header of the application form

logo_url.label: URL of the logo
logo_url.help: Currently the logo has to be hosted on a server and be accessible via an external URL

privacy_statement_url.label: Link to privacy statement
privacy_statement_url.help: Will be displayed in the application form and has to be agreed to

contribution_statement_url.label: Link to contribution statement
contribution_statement_url.help: Will be displayed in the application form and has to be agreed to

constitution_url.label: Link to constitution
constitution_url.help: Will be displayed in the application form and has to be agreed to

membership_start_cycle_type.label: Membership start cycle
membership_start_cycle_type.help: The cycle in which memberships start

has_consented_media_publication_is_requi.label: Consent media publication required
has_consented_media_publication_is_requi.help: If enabled, the consent to media publication is required for all members

has_consented_media_publication_default_.label: Default value for consent media publication

edit_hint: Only certain fields can be edited on you own. Please contact the support if you need to change other fields.

tax_account_chart.label: Tax account group
tax_account_chart.help: The tax account group used for this club.

tax_account_chart_source.label: Source of the tax account group
tax_account_chart_source.help: The source of the tax account group.
